TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SessionParameter extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter

summary.span: 将会话变量的值绑定到参数对象。

span.span: Binds the value of a session variable to a parameter object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `SessionParameter`对象通常用于在 数据库查询的子句中包括变量的值 `Where` 。A `SessionParameter` object is typically used in order to include the value of an variable in the `Where` clause of a database query. 属性标识从中检索值的会话变量 。The property identifies the session variable from which the retrieves a value. > [!NOTE] > 如果未设置指定的会话变量，则使用对象将数据绑定到参数的控件 可能会引发异常。Controls that bind data to a parameter by using a object might throw an exception if the specified session variable is not set. 若要避免此错误 (适当) ，请设置 属性。To avoid this error (where appropriate), set the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 对象。The following example shows how to use a object. 该示例假定另一页已将雇员 ID 值存储在名为的会话变量中 `empid` 。The example assumes that another page has stored an employee ID value in a session variable named `empid`. 示例页使用 `empid` 查询子句中的 session 变量 `Where` ，并在控件中显示查询结果 。The example page uses the `empid` session variable in the `Where` clause of a query and displays the result of the query in a control. 由于 对象的属性 设置为5，因此，如果在 `employeeID` `empid` 运行此示例之前未设置名为的会话变量，则仍将显示值为5的记录的数据。Because the property of the object is set to 5, data for the record that has the `employeeID` value of 5 will still be displayed if no session variable named `empid` is set before you run the example. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SessionParameter_1_decl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SessionParameter_1_decl/CS/webform21cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SessionParameter_1_decl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SessionParameter_1_decl/VB/webform21vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每次调用方法时，对象都会尝试绑定到 session 变量的值 。The object attempts to bind to the value of the session variable every time the method is called. `context`方法使用参数 检索对象绑定到的名称/值对 。The `context` parameter is used by the method to retrieve the name/value pair that the object binds to. `control`忽略参数。The `control` parameter is ignored.

summary.span: 获取或设置此参数绑定到的会话变量的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the session variable that the parameter binds to.

value.span: 一个字符串，用于标识此参数绑定到的 。

span.span: A string that identifies the that the parameter binds to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性标识与 Web 浏览器关联的当前会话对象中存储的名称/值对。The property identifies a name/value pair that is stored in the current session object associated with the Web browser. 尽管 属性标识对的名称，但在 运行时将绑定到其对应的值。While the property identifies the name of the pair, the binds to its corresponding value at run time. 如果在会话中找不到预期的会话字符串名称/值对，则 方法会将参数绑定到属性的值 （如果已设置）。If the expected session string name/value pair is not found in the session, the method binds the parameter to the value of the property, if it is set. 如果 未设置该属性，则该 方法无法将参数绑定到值。If the property is not set, the method fails to bind the parameter to a value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式创建 对象，设置其 和 属性，并将其添加到 控件的集合中 。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively create a object, set its , and properties, and add it to the collection of a control. 控件显示由控件提交的 SQL 查询的结果 。A control displays the results of the SQL query submitted by the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SessionParameter_1_decl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SessionParameter_1_decl/CS/webform21cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SessionParameter_1_decl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SessionParameter_1_decl/VB/webform21vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式设置 对象的属性 。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically set the property of a object.
